chatWithMessages.userMessage: provide a list of biggest ever built moving vehicles
chatWithMessages.assistantMessage:
Here is a list of the **biggest ever built moving vehicles** (focusing on massive mobile/self-propelled land machines, ranked roughly by a combination of physical size, length, weight, and historical/fame recognition):

- **Overburden Conveyor Bridge F60**  
  Largest by overall physical dimensions / length. Length: ~502 m, Height: ~80 m, Weight: ~13,600 tons. Built in East Germany (1988â€“1991) for lignite mining overburden removal; moves very slowly on rails.

- **Bagger 293** (bucket-wheel excavator)  
  Heaviest land vehicle ever built (~14,200â€“14,196 tons). Height: ~96 m, Length: ~225 m. Built in 1995 by TAKRAF; Guinness record holder for largest/heaviest terrestrial excavator; removes up to ~240,000 tons of material per day.

- **Bagger 288** (bucket-wheel excavator)  
  Previously the heaviest land vehicle record holder. Height: ~96 m, Length: ~220 m, Weight: ~13,500 tons. Built in 1978 by Krupp/TAKRAF; famous for its 22 km relocation crossing roads, rivers, and highways.

- **NASA Crawler-Transporter** (CT-1 and CT-2)  
  Heaviest self-powered land vehicle (Guinness record after upgrades). Weight: ~2,721â€“3,016 tons, Dimensions: 40 m Ã— 35 m. Built in 1965; transports rockets/spacecraft at Kennedy Space Center (max speed ~1â€“2 mph).

- **BelAZ-75710** (mining dump truck)  
  Largest truck by payload capacity (~450 tons). Empty weight: ~360 tons, Length: ~20.6 m. Modern ultra-class haul truck; one of the biggest wheeled moving vehicles.

- **LeTourneau L-2350** (wheel loader / front-end loader)  
  Largest earthmover/loader by Guinness records. Massive bucket capacity; tire diameter ~4 m. Used in heavy mining; one of the biggest wheeled loaders.

Other notable huge moving machines include:
- Big Muskie (historical stripping shovel, ~13,500 tons, dismantled)
- Marion 6360 ("The Captain", giant stripping shovel, ~12,700 tons, scrapped)
- Various giant tunnel boring machines (e.g., Herrenknecht models up to ~17â€“20 m diameter cutters, though often not fully self-propelled in the same way)

Note: "Biggest" depends on the metricâ€”length (F60), weight (Bagger 293), self-powered mobility (NASA Crawler), or payload (BelAZ). These are primarily land-based industrial/mining/transport vehicles rather than ships, aircraft, or trains.

chatWithCodeExample.userMessage: show me beautiful one liners for kotlin, swift, c, python, js
chatWithCodeExample.codeIntro: Here are some short, beautiful one-liners in each language (2025 edition ðŸ˜„):

items.title: Mars
items.description: The Red Planet, fourth from the Sun and a prime target for human exploration.

items.title: Black Holes
items.description: Regions of spacetime where gravity is so strong nothing can escape.

items.title: Apollo 11
items.description: The first crewed mission to land on the Moon in 1969, carrying three astronauts.

items.title: Saturn's Rings
items.description: Spectacular ice and rock rings encircling the gas giant Saturn.

items.title: Voyager Program
items.description: Twin spacecraft launched in 1977, now in interstellar space.

items.title: Milky Way
items.description: Our home galaxy containing over 100 billion stars and countless planets.

items.title: Solar Eclipses
items.description: When the Moon passes between the Sun and Earth, casting a shadow.

items.title: Neutron Stars
items.description: Ultra-dense remnants of massive stars packed into a tiny sphere.
